title: Russian GP: Hamilton wins after Ferrari team orders row
text:
(CNN) Lewis Hamilton claimed his 82nd Grand Prix win with victory in the Russia GP Sunday after Ferrari's challenge imploded amid a row over team orders.

Hamilton led a Mercedes one-two in Sochi to increase his title lead over teammate Valterri Bottas to 73 points with 130 points remaining, a sixth world championship crown firmly in his grasp.

Ferrari's Charles Leclerc finished third, unable to capitalize on his fourth straight pole position and his team's apparent dominance.

"What an effort, guys," said a jubilant Hamilton on the radio after taking the checkered flag for the ninth time this season

"What an incredible job. That is exactly what we needed. We never give up."

"Just an incredible job from all the guys here, not giving up. Pushing forward, always trying to be innovative, and just never giving up. And that makes me incredibly inspired. " - @LewisHamilton
